caseTitle: Mir Muhammad v. The State through Prosecutor General Sindh
tagline: Discussion: (1) Inconsistencies between the injuries mentioned in the FIR and the medico-legal report (2) Special Medical Board found the injuries fabricated (3) It is not the duty of the Court to monitor the investigation (4) The gravity of the allegation does not impede the grant of pre-arrest bail if reasonable grounds are available.
